headline.main: SURVIVORS DEPICT BATTLES IN PACIFIC; Naval Officers, Back in U.S., Say 'We've Got to Get Down in Mud and Fight Like Hell' ARMY NURSES ARRIVE FROM BATAAN AND CORREGIDOR SURVIVORS DEPICT BATTLES IN PACIFIC

lead_paragraph: Arriving in the United States in groups from various parts of the far-flung battlefront in the Western and Southern Pacific, nearly 250 survivors of the war with Japan brought home yesterday their experiences of fighting the enemy in the sky, on land and on sea on Bataan and Corregidor, in the Coral Sea, off Australia and elsewhere.
abstract: Arrives, US; int; promotion to lt comdr recommended
